textAfterTable: Great for these types of students This is a great school for people who work, who have children, or who just need a non-traditional setting. Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus None. Bang for the buck I think the education that I am receiving is worth more than what I am paying. What to do for fun Live life. Food and Dining There is none Dorm Life There is none. Academic Rigor Because this is an accelerated program, the pace can be challenging. However, all of the professors that I have had dealings with are helpful and understanding and will give extra help if requested. Tips for prospective students Ask questions and be in charge of your education. All of the staff that I have ever had dealings with have been polite, courteous, and professional. In three sentences Brandman is a great school to attend for the non-traditional student. The blended format allows
